CANNOT_ADD.description: You're not able to add a shape at the moment

ALREADY_EXISTS.description: The shape you are trying to add already exists

PERMISSION_DENIED.description: You do not have permission to add a shape

single.description: The shape you are looking for does not exist

multiple.description: The shapes you are looking for do not exist

NOT_REACHABLE.description: The shapes are not available at the moment

PERMISSION_DENIED.description: You do not have permission to access shapes

CANNOT_UPDATE.description: You're not able to update a shape at the moment

PERMISSION_DENIED.description: You do not have permission to update a shape

CANNOT_DELETE.description: The shape you are trying to delete cannot be deleted

PERMISSION_DENIED.description: You do not have permission to delete a shape

WENT_WRONG.description: Something went wrong while processing your request
